meanings.sent1: The punsters at the comedy club had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent2: My friends are punsters who always come up with clever wordplay.
meanings.sent3: The punsters in the joke competition were on a roll with their witty remarks.
meanings.sent4: The punsters' humor was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the punsters' hilarious jokes from last night.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the practice of making puns.
meanings.sent1: During the punsters' meeting, they shared their latest pun creations.
meanings.sent2: The punsters' pun-off was a battle of wits and wordplay.
meanings.sent3: The punsters' puns were so punny that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The punsters' pun-making skills were as sharp as a sword.
meanings.sent5: The punsters' puns were like music to my ears.
